name: Glitched? Or Programmed That Way?
description:
Play as a girl robot called Glitch and save a strange universe from an impending apocalypse.

Steam page here and gameplay trailer here!

Features:
  • 3D Platformer gameplay with ragdoll physics. Different worlds full of dangerous hazards such as traps, obstacles, and hazards
  • Character customization - customize your character with different outfits, weapons, stat builds etc.
  • Online multiplayer gameplay: both co-op and PvP. Invite your friends to join you and brave the hazards or test out your custom build against other players. Play online with up to a total of SIX players. Online text chat and proximity voice chat.
  • Visit multiple other worlds with their own characters, NPCs and enemies. Discover and unlock new items, defeat enemies, complete NPC quests and discover secrets. Complete NPC quests and boss battles.
  • Physics-based gameplay - You'll need to use not just your timing and jumping to traverse these dangerous worlds, but ragdoll skills to tumble yourself across hazards and other threats
  • souls like gameplay
